comments.comment: The overall kurta was very nice. The fitting was proper and of the kurta and the suit but it was not the mirror work instead it was reflective paper stiched in it if you wash it.. it can washoff immediately. The pyjama was of M sixe but it was very small as it you slightly stretch you leg it will tear off. They do not exchange kurta separately.

This is a great set. No issues at all, the mirrors are faux mirrors but that's what you get at this price so no qualms with that. 
The only issue I have is with the fitting, but it's expected with pre-made clothes. 

Overall a great product made even better with its low price point. Go for it.
Perfect fit only the pants went tight but the rest was great I really liked the product
The sherwani and kurta are very nice tho the kurta is not up to the expectation. All together a very good product, comfortable to wear and it will make u very attractive.
This was really good purchase, colour was same as shown, quality was really good, perfect fitting and cherry on top was price ... all in  all loved it
Superb quality and look awesome 😎, best for dulha brother 😁, awesome fabric, colour and embroidery work superb, good finishing, comfortable in body

Everything is good but they really need to work on packing. Customer will not love to receive his item in this kind of packing. You should also provide hanger for the cloth. Pant is too small for 6ft guy. Who is purchasing small size.
